document.full_text: texas governor rick perry admitted on tuesday that the state will have to use about a third of its rainy day fund to close a budget deficit this year, abandoning his stance that the fund should not be used.
document.title: in reversal, texas governor backs using rainy day fund
lines_and_colors: texas governor rick perry admitted on tuesday that the state will have to use about a third of its rainy day fund to close a budget deficit this year, abandoning his stance that the fund should not be used.
